name: extract-urls
description: Extract all URLs (http://, https://, ftp://) from a string at specified path

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field containing text with URLs (e.g., 'content.text')

output.description: Array of URL strings found in the text (http://, https://, ftp://), or empty array if none found or path doesn't exist/isn't string

examples.description: Extract single HTTP URL from text
No URLs in text returns empty array

input.text: No links here, just plain text
